name: Controller
description: Controller contract. Controller contract for Prime Pools is based on the convex Booster.sol contract.

eventDecorators.name: AddedPool
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: Deposited
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: FeeManagerChanged
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: FeeTokensCleared
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: FeesChanged
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: OwnerChanged
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: PoolManagerChanged
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: PoolShutDown
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: SystemShutdown
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: TreasuryChanged
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: VoteDelegateChanged
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: Withdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

functionDecorators.name: addFeeToken
functionDecorators.description: sets the address of the feeToken.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeToken
parameterDecorators.description: feeToken.

functionDecorators.name: addPool
functionDecorators.description: creates a new pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _lptoken
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the lp token.

parameterDecorators.name: _gauge
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the gauge controller.

functionDecorators.name: bulkPoolShutdown
functionDecorators.description: Shuts down multiple pools. Claims rewards for that pool before shutting it down.

parameterDecorators.name: _startPoolIdx
parameterDecorators.description: Start pool index.

parameterDecorators.name: _endPoolIdx
parameterDecorators.description: End pool index (excluded).

functionDecorators.name: claimRewards
functionDecorators.description: claims rewards from a specific pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: the id of the pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _gauge
parameterDecorators.description: address of the gauge.

functionDecorators.name: clearDelegation
functionDecorators.description: Clears delegation of voting power from EOA for VoterProxy.

functionDecorators.name: clearFeeTokens
functionDecorators.description: Clears fee tokens.

functionDecorators.name: delegateVotingPower
functionDecorators.description: Delegates voting power from VoterProxy.

parameterDecorators.name: _delegateTo
parameterDecorators.description: to whom we delegate voting power.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposits an amount of LP token into a specific pool, mints reward and optionally tokens and stakes them into the reward contract. Sender must approve LP tokens to Controller smart contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The pool id to deposit lp tokens into.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of lp tokens to be deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: _stake
parameterDecorators.description: bool for wheather the tokens should be staked.

functionDecorators.name: depositAll
functionDecorators.description: Deposits and stakes all LP tokens. Sender must approve LP tokens to Controller smart contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The pool id to deposit lp tokens into.

parameterDecorators.name: _stake
parameterDecorators.description: bool for wheather the tokens should be staked.

functionDecorators.name: earmarkFees
functionDecorators.description: Claims rewards from the Balancer's fee distributor contract and transfers the tokens into the rewards contract.

functionDecorators.name: earmarkRewards
functionDecorators.description: Claims rewards from a pool and disperses them to the rewards contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: the id of the pool where lp tokens are held.

functionDecorators.name: poolLength
functionDecorators.description: returns the number of pools.

functionDecorators.name: redeemWethBal
functionDecorators.description: Burns all D2DWethBal from a user, and transfers the equivalent amount of unlocked WethBal tokes.

functionDecorators.name: setFactories
functionDecorators.description: sets the reward, token, and stash factory addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: _rfactory
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the reward factory.

parameterDecorators.name: _sfactory
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the stash factory.

parameterDecorators.name: _tfactory
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token factory.

functionDecorators.name: setFeeManager
functionDecorators.description: sets the feeManager variable.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeM
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fee manager.

functionDecorators.name: setFees
functionDecorators.description: sets the lock, staker, caller, platform fees and profit fees.

parameterDecorators.name: _platformFee
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to set for the platform fees.

parameterDecorators.name: _profitFee
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to set for the profit fees.

functionDecorators.name: setOwner
functionDecorators.description: sets the owner variable.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the owner of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: setPoolManager
functionDecorators.description: sets the poolManager variable.

parameterDecorators.name: _poolM
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the pool manager.

functionDecorators.name: setRewardContracts
functionDecorators.description: sets the lockRewards variable.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewards
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the rewards contract.

functionDecorators.name: setTreasury
functionDecorators.description: sets the contracts treasury variables.

parameterDecorators.name: _treasury
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the treasury contract.

functionDecorators.name: setVoteDelegate
functionDecorators.description: sets the voteDelegate variable.

parameterDecorators.name: _voteDelegate
parameterDecorators.description: The address of whom votes will be delegated to.

functionDecorators.name: shutdownSystem
functionDecorators.description: shuts down all pools. This shuts down the contract.

functionDecorators.name: voteGaugeWeight
functionDecorators.description: Votes for multiple gauges.

parameterDecorators.name: _gauges
parameterDecorators.description: array of gauge addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: _weights
parameterDecorators.description: array of vote weights.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws lp tokens from the pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The pool id to withdraw lp tokens from.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of LP tokens to withdraw.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawAll
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws all of the lp tokens in the pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The pool id to withdraw lp tokens from.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawTo
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws LP tokens and sends them to a specified address.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The pool id to deposit lp tokens into.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of LP tokens to withdraw.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawUnlockedWethBal
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws `amount` of unlocked WethBal to controller. WethBal is redeemable by burning equivalent amount of D2D WethBal.
